subject: p11378150
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there has been a lobectomy performed on the left. Chest tube is in place and there is no definite pneumothorax. Post-surgical opacification is seen at the left base consistent with atelectasis, effusion, and possible consolidation. The trachea has been pulled over to this side and there is mild mediastinal shift. Atelectatic changes are seen at the right base. Of incidental note is small amount of gas along the upper chest border on the left.
